conversation.content: Hi, can you tell me if economy class tickets are refundable?

Hello! Economy class refundability depends on the type of fare purchased. Basic economy tickets are usually non-refundable, while flexible economy tickets may be refundable with a cancellation fee. Would you like me to check your specific booking?
I haven’t booked yet, but I want to know before I purchase.
I see! If you want a refundable economy ticket, look for 'Flexible Economy' during booking. Let me know if you need help choosing the right fare.
Thanks! I’ll check the options.
You're welcome! Let me know if you have any other questions. Safe travels!
Hello, what are the baggage rules for international flights?
Hi! Baggage allowances vary depending on your route and ticket type. Could you share your departure and destination cities?
I’m flying from New York to London.

For economy class on this route, you are allowed one checked bag up to 23kg (50 lbs) and one carry-on bag. Business and first-class passengers may carry additional luggage. Would you like to check excess baggage fees?
Yes, how much is the fee for an extra bag?
The fee for an extra checked bag on your route is $100 if booked online in advance and $120 at the airport.
Got it! Thanks for the info.
You're welcome! Let me know if you need further assistance. Have a great trip!
Hi, is there a fee for changing my travel dates?
Hello! Change fees depend on your ticket type. Some fares allow free changes, while others may have a fee. Could you share your booking details?
I booked an economy ticket from Los Angeles to Chicago.
Let me check… Standard economy tickets on this route have a $75 change fee plus any difference in fare. However, if you booked a flexible fare, you can change your flight without a fee.
Okay, I’ll decide and get back to you.
No problem! Let me know if you need help rebooking. Safe travels!
Hi, do you allow pets on board?
Hello! Yes, small pets are allowed in the cabin on most flights, while larger pets must travel in the cargo hold. Could you provide details about your pet?
I have a small dog. Can I bring it in the cabin with me?
Small dogs that fit in an airline-approved carrier under the seat are allowed in the cabin. A pet travel fee applies, and reservations are required as space is limited.
How much is the fee?
The in-cabin pet fee is $125 per flight. Would you like to add your pet to your reservation now?
Not yet. I need to check the carrier dimensions first.
Sounds good! The maximum carrier size allowed is 18x11x11 inches. Let me know if you need further assistance!
Hi, do you charge extra for seat selection?

Hello! Seat selection fees depend on your ticket type. Standard economy passengers may need to pay extra for preferred seats, while business and first-class passengers can choose seats for free. Would you like me to check for your specific flight?
Yes, I booked an economy ticket from Miami to San Francisco.
For your flight, standard seat selection is free, but preferred seats with extra legroom start at $25. Would you like to see available options?
Yes, I prefer an aisle seat with extra legroom.
I found an aisle seat with extra legroom for $30. Would you like to proceed with the selection?
Yes, please reserve it for me.
Done! Your seat has been reserved. You'll see it on your boarding pass. Let me know if you need anything else!
